text: To give my testimony about what they did...
In 96 I was sterilised.
I came to the Jicati Medical Centre
and there they tricked me and brought me to the hospital in Huancabamba.
They took a little blood from my finger,
put me in a bed and then they did the operation on me,
I remember it was at  7 o'clock in the evening.
The next day they took me in a van,
and threw me out in Nangali.
From there it took me  3 days to struggle home.
Then I became ill and I'm still ill today. Â
I can't do anything.
I was abandoned by my husband and my children.
I am too poor to send them to school,
so 3 of them left and went to the jungle.
Only one of them supports me.
I'm very sick,
I can't do anything.
The sterilisation operation has reduced me to this,
I am useless.
My children and my husband abandoned me because of the operation.
